module.name: Music on Hold
module.description: Uploading and management of sound files (wav, mp3) to be used for on-hold music.
module.changelog: *1.3.1* Changed name to Music on Hold (from On Hold Music) *1.3* Bumped version to assist upgraders from the 2.1 tree. No other changes. *1.2* First release for FreePBX 2.2 - Fixed compatibility issue with new UI
